oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte-de-visite of Charles Perkins
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Charles Perkins seated, his arm propped on a table next to two books. Perkins lived on Del Rio Pike in Franklin, Tennessee, in Poplar Grove and was the home of Nicholas Tate Perkins.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
